author: Reuters Editorial
title: Volkswagen open to alliances in areas like autonomous driving
text:
WOLFSBURG, Germany (Reuters) - Volkswagen’s ( VOWG_p.DE ) new Chief Executive Herbert Diess on Friday said the car and truck maker is open to alliances in areas like self-driving cars.
Herbert Diess, Volkswagen's new CEO poses after a news conference at the Volkswagen plant in Wolfsburg, Germany April 13, 2018. REUTERS/Fabian Bimmer Speaking in Wolfsburg, Germany, at his first news conference since being appointed CEO on Thursday, Herbert Diess said: “I would not rule out further partnerships. Autonomous driving requires immense investments.”
Reporting by Andreas Cremer; Writing by Edward Taylor; Editing by Maria Sheahan
